ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampirella is back! Confused, desperate for answers, Vampirella turns to a mystic to unravel the tangled threads of her origin. He takes her on a journey to hell and back, deep down into the murky waters of her past - her real past. What she finds brings her face to face with her mother, her home, and the very moment of her birth. It's epic horror as only Mike Carey could tell.
Vampirella seeks help to unlock the secrets of her past.
ComicInfo.Title: Source, Part 1
